BIOGRAPHY

I am a self-tought programmer, started to learn coding at first half of May 2018. A good portion of my life I was working in costumer service (Hotel administration, restaurant administration and so on.). I realized that this is not the thing I wanted to do becouse other half of my life I was playing in a punk-rock band, creating videos for my friends and modding games I love. Quit my job at the start of summer 2018 and dedicated all my time learnig how to code. Since that day, passion for learning something new in code universe, became my full-time obsession.
